GSD.description:
video: fbdev: sm712fb: Fix crash in smtcfb_write()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit aeb635b49530b7d19e140949753409f759ba99be. For more details please see the references link.
